document.full_text: united states coach bob bradley made five changes to his starting lineup for tuesday's exhibition match against paraguay in nashville. the more noteworthy change is how those players will line up.
document.title: u.s. changes lineup and formation for paraguay
lines_and_colors: united states coach bob bradley made five changes to his starting lineup for tuesday's exhibition match against paraguay in nashville. the more noteworthy change is how those players will line up.
